nodes.bodyText:
The pip install of sphinx didn't cut it...
(ts_docs) /Users/markhama/Development/a2-serve/docs/sphinx markhama@f01898b363ea% make html                             
/bin/sh: sphinx-build: command not found

So I did a conda install sphinx=3
And that got me past that problem...
I also had to install:
pip install sphinxcontrib-katex torch

And I still ran into issues with make html... we need at least a stub index.rst in there like...
############
TorchServe
############

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :glob:

   *

Even so there are a lot of warnings.
But I think if you update the requirements and validate you can do a fresh env and get a build, then we're at a good starting point to layer on the rest.

Thanks for the review

Added sphinxcontrib-katex and torch. Note they will also be added as part of the github actions
I was able to install sphinx by running pip install -r requirements.txt from the docs/sphinx folder. The github actions will similarly use pip install.
The index.rst file will be added in [PR #290 (https://github.com//pull/290/files)
The warnings are syntax suggestions in the md files; they aren't breaking, but something we can clean up later if desired

Thanks for the review
